html.problem:
A Two Block Swing
A box of mass M is at rest on a horizontal table. The coefficient of static friction between the box and the table is \(\mu\). The box is connected by a taut string to a block of unknown mass m, initially held horizontally as shown and then released. The box begins to slide at the instant the block reaches the bottom point of its swing.
m = "M*mu/2"
Find the mass m of the block.
m =
